TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner

remarks.format: ## Remarks DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner provides design-time support for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> controls. It extends its parent class, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartDesigner>, by adding a control-specific <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.TemplateGroups%2A> collection. DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner does not render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Overrides the parent method to prevent rendering of the control.
Docs.returns: Either an empty string ("") or the value of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPartDesigner.GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml%2A>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If there is no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart.WebPartsTemplate%2A> associated with the control, the designer displays the standard gray box with the class name and instance name of the control. Otherwise, no design-time rendering occurs at all because the check boxes and Web Parts titles are rendered by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.CatalogPartChrome> instead of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.DeclarativeCatalogPart> itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets the markup to represent an empty control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This operation renders the control as a gray box showing the class name and the instance name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed

Docs.param: The control associated with the designer.
Docs.summary: Binds the designer to the associated control and sets the view flag to .
Gets a collection of template groups, each containing one or more template definitions.
Docs.value: The appended associated with this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The TemplateGroups property overrides its base implementation to add a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateGroup> object that is specific to this class.
